alert.note: Alert for Linn; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 10 at 2:56PM CDT until April 10 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Miami County in east central Kansas... Northeastern Linn County in east central Kansas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fontana, or near La Cygne, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... La Cygne, Linn Valley, Fontana and New Lancaster. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
